title: Meet the Women Who Are Suing Robert De Niro
description:
Robert De Niro has his hands full, fighting his ex-wife Grace Hightower in divorce court while also fighting the Vice President of his production company, Graham Chase Robinson, in court over fraud and workplace harassment allegations.  Tune in as we break it all down!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
